items.title: Hamas police chief among 11 killed in Israeli strike on Gaza, medics say
items.description: Three children and two women were also reportedly among the 11 killed at a tent camp.

items.title: Toxic waste from Bhopal gas leak factory removed after 40 years
items.description: The deadly gas leak at the Union Carbide factory in central India killed thousands in 1984.

items.title: A former American football player and an aspiring nurse among those killed
items.description: The identities of those killed in New Orleans are starting to emerge as families pay tribute.

items.title: Moment New Orleans attacker enters busy street in pick-up truck
items.description: CCTV catches moment pick-up truck turns into a busy street in New Orleans killing several people.

items.title: Police probe if blast at Trump hotel is linked to New Orleans attack
items.description: President Biden said "any possible connection" was being investigated, but "thus far, there is nothing to report".
